net.sf.libai.common
Class SymmetricSignum

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.libai.common.SymmetricSignum
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function
public class SymmetricSignum
extends java.lang.Object
implements Function

Symmetric Signum function F(x) = -1 if x < 0 or 1 if x >= 1 This function is not derivable.
